It can be proven that such a sequence always exists under the given constraints.

A palindrome is a sequence that reads the same from left to right as from right to left. For example,
[1,2,1,3,1,2,1]
,
[5,5,5,5]
, and
[4,3,3,4]
are palindromes, while
[1,2]
and
[2,3,3,3,3]
are not.
